amendment.description: To strike the authorization of appropriations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2546 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2546 proposed by Senator Feinstein for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S9757; text: CR S9757) To strike the authorization of appropriations.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2546 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
